database.sql: create or replace view V_PRODVIRTINVENTORY as select T_SALESPOS.ID, (select T_CMABSTRACT.ID from T_CMABSTRACT where T_CMABSTRACT.UUID = 'a973cde4-bd64-4d79-8729-e504cecd0485') as typeid, T_SALESPOS.DOCID, T_SALESPOS.PROD, T_PRODPRODUCT.NAME as prodname, T_PRODPRODUCT.DESCR as proddescr, T_SALESPOS.QUANTITY, '0' as reserved, T_SALESPOS.UOMID, '0' as storageid from T_ERPDOC join T_SALESPOS on T_ERPDOC.ID = T_SALESPOS.DOCID join T_DMSTATUS on T_ERPDOC.STATUS = T_DMSTATUS.ID join T_CMABSTRACT on T_DMSTATUS.TYPEID = T_CMABSTRACT.ID join T_PRODPRODUCT on T_PRODPRODUCT.ID = T_SALESPOS.PROD where T_CMABSTRACT.UUID = '84f2f612-01c1-4d8d-8cfd-875107d1a80c' and T_DMSTATUS.KEY = 'Open' union select T_PRODINVENTORY.ID, (select T_CMABSTRACT.ID from T_CMABSTRACT where T_CMABSTRACT.UUID = '58ab564e-1f81-47f6-af76-b864a969c5ed') as typeid, '0', T_PRODINVENTORY.PRODUCTID, T_PRODPRODUCT.NAME, T_PRODPRODUCT.DESCR, T_PRODINVENTORY.QUANTITY, T_PRODINVENTORY.RESERVED, T_PRODINVENTORY.UOMID, T_PRODINVENTORY.STORAGEID from T_PRODINVENTORY join T_PRODPRODUCT on T_PRODPRODUCT.ID = T_PRODINVENTORY.PRODUCTID
